title: Snowbound
description: Nina Santangeles is lost in a blizzard as the roads become more treacherous and nightfall looms. She spots a light and knocks on the door of the house, but canâ€™t believe who answers.  She has two unpleasant choices.  Freeze to death in her car, or wait out the storm with Cameron Easton and Alex Gable, the two men who seduced her, and then trashed her career three years ago.
author: Ravenna Tate
